name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Radwomen in STEM with every new tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension pulls in info from wikipedia about a new woman-to-know in STEM with every new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Learn about a rad woman in STEM with every new tab.

This extension pulls in info (and a picture if available) from Wikipedia about a random woman in STEM in each new tab.
